verses.name: Luke 15:9
verses.text: And when she hath found it, she calleth her friends and her neighbours together, saying, Rejoice with me; for I have found the piece which I had lost.

verses.name: Luke 15:10
verses.text: Likewise, I say unto you, there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth.

verses.name: Luke 15:11
verses.text: And he said, A certain man had two sons:

verses.name: Luke 15:12
verses.text: And the younger of them said to his father, Father, give me the portion of goods that falleth to me. And he divided unto them his living.
